title: Mini-Ep 167: Hot Baths and Cold Showers
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 167: Hot Baths and Cold Showers
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree slather their hands with “desk lotion” and listeners write in with questions about enhancing bath-time and setting and keeping boundaries. Plus, a listener shares a (literal) hot tip for bedtime!Activity of the Week: What’s a boundary...
description:
Kate and Doree slather their hands with “desk lotion” and listeners write in with questions about enhancing bath-time and setting and keeping boundaries. Plus, a listener shares a (literal) hot tip for bedtime!


Activity of the Week: What’s a boundary you need to set for yourself this week? How can you implement it?


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).

  • ALLURE: THE SCIENCE OF BEAUTY - Come get nerdy with Allure! New episodes every Thursday. Listen to Allure: The Science of Beauty wherever you get your podcasts.
